channel.title: Valentines day
channel.description:
Write a poem for valentines day here is one from me
Charmanders are red, Squirtles are blue, If you were a Pokemon, I'd choose you.
This shit is so romantic and Darwin commented "you definitely need some pussy" Write one lel.

item.title: Valentines day
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:51, topic:432832”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=535540.msg3916108#msg3916108 date=1329194779]

Need a sonnet for dis 1 hawt bitch tomorrow. Get to work moparians.

Happy Valentine’s day from the heart
I’’ do my best not to fart.
I’m writing you sincerely from that place
That should bring a smile upon your face.
My penis dressed for you in lace.
For you to make love to an embrace.
With a smile that welcomes all of your joy
And hopes that I’m preferred over your toy.
I’m counting the seconds of the day
That are left for more sex positions way
And I hope you won’t be led away.
If any rain should fall from above
You can still have a day that is filled with love.

[hr]

credits: not fully my sonnet I edited it a fair bit though
[/quote]

Need to recite in school, Penis is bad word in public school.[/quote]you haven’t seen my michael jackson poem xD

Enjoy yet another poem:
Roses are red…
Violets are blue…
I’m all alone…
So Fu-uuck you!

Read full topic
